name: BulkDeleteBookingCustomAttributes
description:
Bulk delete custom attributes for bookings.

Use this tool to delete multiple custom attributes associated with bookings in bulk. Ensure the proper OAuth permissions are set: 'APPOINTMENTS_WRITE' for buyer-level and both 'APPOINTMENTS_ALL_WRITE' and 'APPOINTMENTS_WRITE' for seller-level. Requires an active subscription to 'Appointments Plus' or 'Appointments Premium' for seller-level actions.

parameters.name: booking_custom_attributes_to_delete
parameters.description: A JSON object containing 1 to 25 Delete requests. Each request should include a unique ID and the necessary details to delete a custom attribute.

values.description:
A map containing 1 to 25 individual Delete requests. For each request, provide an
arbitrary ID that is unique for this `BulkDeleteBookingCustomAttributes` request and the
information needed to delete a custom attribute.

value_schema.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.
